item.title: Switching to Hyprland
item.description: Hyprland is a dynamic tiling Wayland (a replacement for the X11 window system protocol and architectur) compositor based on wlroots. Introduction I have used tiling window manager ever since i came to know about them (very recently really). I was using dwm which is based on xorg but since everybody was moving to hyprland i decided i should move to wayland too since it is modern and more efficient than xorg.
